product_name: BIC Sport Duratec Original Stand Up Paddle Board - Kids' - 8' 4"
long_description: A great paddle board for kids just getting started, this lightweight 8 ft. 4 in. board is made with rugged Dura-Tec construction for terrific performance in both flatwater and small wave conditions.
short_description: A great paddle board for kids just getting started, this lightweight 8 ft. 4 in. board is made with rugged Dura-Tec construction for terrific performance in both flatwater and small wave conditions.
